body_html:
I confirmed that TH, THS, THC, THNN, THCUNN, and THCS compile with MSVC 2015 (with lots of warning).
But I couldn't build libshm because it heavily relies on POSIX interface. Do you know how to get around this problem?

body:
I confirmed that TH, THS, THC,  THNN, THCUNN, and THCS compile with MSVC 2015 (with lots of warning). 
But I couldn't build libshm because it heavily relies on POSIX interface. Do you know how to get around this problem?
